rare.name: Ewok Village
rare.desc: You discovered an ewok village, look around for goodies!

rare.name: Treasure Tree
rare.desc: The tree's leaves are gold coins!

rare.name: Invisable Forrest
rare.desc: Good Job finding this it's hard to find! It's invisable

common.name: Forest Path
common.desc: You're walking along a forest path... again...

common.name: Forest Tree Tops
common.desc: You're walking along the top of the trees.. Wait.. How did you get up here?

common.name: Tree Filled Area
common.desc: There Are Lots of Trees And Even more Baddies!

common.name: Giant Bird Nest
common.desc: What kind of bird would need a nest THIS big!?!?

common.name: Almost Empty Area
common.desc: just a few trees that's it, oh yeah and there's a monster behind you.

common.name: World's Tallest Tree
common.desc: it's so tall the clouds are at about the half way point.

common.name: Suspicious Looking Tree
common.desc: Your Pretty Sure There's something hidden here.

common.name: World's Largest Tree's Roots
common.desc: The roots are huge too! They will also work as an intant kill spike.

common.name: Tiny Tree
common.desc: Be carefull! You might break it by stepping on it.

common.name: Cobwebby forest
common.desc: I hope your not afraid of spiders

common.name: Moving Trees
common.desc: There are four trees your pretty sure are moving either that or your crazy.

common.name: Dark Forest
common.desc: It's night here but not anywhere else.

common.name: Destroyed Forest
common.desc: Looks like a war happend here or something

common.name: Swamp
common.desc: It's just a Swamp expect me to say something funny?
